text:
The other day, I watched a video
preparing Easter eggs.

They were using a fork to poke holes
in the bottom of the eggs.

It's obvious, but to avoid breaking each one,
they were being so careful... It's heavy work~~...
I bet they accidentally cracked a few.

But even the broken eggshells
could be reused as decorations.

Natsuha-chan!
That's exactly what they said in the video.
